Title: Your Best Year Ever, Chapter 4: Thinking Backward Is a Must
Description:
This is the fourth chapter from Michael's revised and updated best-selling book, Your Best Year Ever. Over the next month, we'll be releasing a few chapters a week so that you can be prepared for 2024 to be your Best Year Ever.

If you want to read or listen to the entire book today, then visit www.yourbestyeareverbook.com and pick up a copy. After buying the book, make sure to sign up for your FREE ticket to Your Best Year Ever Live (a $197 value!).

This chapter discusses the concept of "backward thinking," emphasizing the importance of reflecting on past experiences to shape a better future.

Want the rest of the book now? Make sure to visit www.yourbestyeareverbook.com.
